scripts.lint: yarn workspace jan lint && yarn workspace jan-web lint
scripts.test-local: yarn lint && yarn build:test && yarn test
scripts.dev:uikit: yarn workspace @janhq/uikit install && yarn workspace @janhq/uikit dev
scripts.build:uikit: yarn workspace @janhq/uikit install && yarn workspace @janhq/uikit build
scripts.build:core: cd core && yarn install && yarn run build
scripts.build:plugins: rimraf ./electron/core/pre-install/*.tgz && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "cd ./plugins/conversational-json && npm install && npm run build:publish" "cd ./plugins/inference-plugin && npm install && npm run build:publish" "cd ./plugins/model-plugin && npm install && npm run build:publish" "cd ./plugins/monitoring-plugin && npm install && npm run build:publish"
scripts.build:test: yarn build:web && yarn workspace jan build:test
scripts.build: yarn build:web && yarn workspace jan build
scripts.build:publish: yarn build:web && yarn workspace jan build:publish
